title: Passport to 2018 NYE Party

banner_image.name: Padre_NYE2017_937x400Party
banner_image.alt: Passport to 2018 NYE Party at The Padre Hotel

description:
Toast 2018 around the world with your hosts Julius and Schzelle as you dig into appetizers and enjoy champagne paired countdowns around the world throughout the night and live music in three different rooms.

Prairie Fire: Blone Faith Band
Brimsone: DJ & Balloon Drop
Prospect Lounge: Dueling Pianos

TICKETS: $20 presale, $30 at the door

STAY THE NIGHT
Rooms starting at $250
Includes: Tickets to NYE party, bottle of champagne, complimentary valet & late check out

NEW YEAR'S DAY BRUNCH
Start the New Year off right with a bubbly brunch at Belvedere Room
9am-3pm
$39 per person includes bottomless champagne
Reservations Recommended >
